programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Surf N' Turf - Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Game Show - Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Unboxing Day / Dave's Pavilion - Alvin's attempts to make money as an internet influencer almost drives a local toy store out of business. // When the Chipmunks accidently ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: U-Fly / Yeti or Not - Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours. // On a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore there's a Yeti nearby, making life miserable for the rest of the family.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep291
programme.desc: Swimming Fools / The Goobfather - SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Drooling Fool / Patrick's Got An Alien Zoo Loose - Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep292
programme.desc: SquidBird / Allergy Attack! - Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes he's developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep104
programme.desc: In Search of Camp Noodist / Kitchen Sponge - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick hike through the woods in search of a fabled nudist colony. // SpongeBob helps Plankton at the Krusty Kanteen, leading to the development of a very familiar sandwich.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Boss Maybe / Family Bonding - Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Net Gains / Pipe Dreams - Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team. // Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Bubble Bass Reviews - It's all about Patrick in this wacky fake sitcom created by and starring Patrick Star.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Stuntin' - Patrick gets a stunt double.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: For the Record - Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Ay Fidelity / Cut the Chisme - When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Backpay Payback / House Hunting - Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil. // The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Waterbending Scroll - After Katara attempts to teach Aang waterbending, she is desperate to improve her abilities.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League Vs. Bizarro League Ep1
programme.desc: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs. Bizarro League - The heroes of the Justice League team up with their Bizarro counterparts to thwart the evil megalomaniac Darkseid and save the galaxy.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Ep106
programme.desc: Count On Merli - Tom & Jerry zip along Singapores vibrant riverside and make a new friend Merli! Will Merli succeed in being the maestro of peace between the two?

programme.title: Lego Ninjago Dragons Rising Ep104
programme.desc: Beyond Madness - When a pilotless Bounty flies into the Monastery, Lloyd, Arin, Sora, and Riyu follow clues back to Kai and Nya who are caught between warring realms.

programme.title: Lego Ninjago Dragons Rising Ep103
programme.desc: Crossroads Carnival - Arin and Sora sneak out of the Monastery to attend the Crossroads Carnival and uncover a villainous plot that puts their new training to the test.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball Ep51A/Ep51B/Ep52A
programme.desc: The Pizza/The Lie/The Butterfly - The Wattersons have had a bad day, but it turns out Larry has too and it's about to get worse, for everyone!

programme.title: Mechamato Ep19/Ep21
programme.desc: Plastic Bottle Royale/Cone-Nichi Wa! - While searching for plastic bottles for their class project, Amato and friends meet a recycling robot made from plastic.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series Ep25/Ep14
programme.desc: Opera Bean/Viral Bean - Mr Bean ends up on stage at the opera house.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons Ep173/Ep163
programme.desc: Oregon Fail/ Duck Hunting Gag: Duck Call/ Life's A Beach/Skyscraper Scrap/ Balloon Salesman: Feeling Down/ The Devil And The DeEp.Blue Sea - Yosemite Sam has wagon woes. Elmer upgrades his duck-calling plan. A family of bears enjoys a day at the beach.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Ep104
programme.desc: Ice Ice Paradise - It's another hot and humid day in Singapore. Cool down with Tom and Jerry by the beach as they chase each other into a frenzy for an icy delight - Ice Kachang!

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers Ep321/Ep322/Ep323/Ep324/Ep325
programme.desc: Hidden Talents/Baby Dj/Good Morning, Little Ones!/Bye Bye Pacifier/Ultra Mini Beat Power Rockers - Dolores suggests putting on a talent show, but without instruments.

programme.title: Craig Of The Creek Ep154/Ep160
programme.desc: Wheels Collide/Left In The Dark - Craig tries to bring together the fastest kids in the Creek.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep1293/Ep109/Ep1300
programme.desc: The Cast/Spice Game/Superhero Feud - Robin is confined to his room due to breaking his leg.

programme.title: Lego Ninjago Dragons Rising Ep120
programme.desc: The Power Within - The Ninjas battle with the Empress pushes MergeQuakes to their crisis point, putting Crossroads and the entire united realms in danger!

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Just three people remain alone in the Tasmanian wilderness. They have no idea how many others are left, heightening the daily challenge - is the end a day away, or 6 months?

programme.title: Designing A Legacy Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Designing a Legacy, architectural nerd Tim Ross travels the length and breadth of the country seeking an alternate story of Australia; one that shows how great design better connects us to place and to each other.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Lorna Dunkley presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Lorna Dunkley brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Hippies Cole and Jane Bradshaw bought a thin sliver of land on a steep site only a landscaper could love. Cole plans to build a house on this challenging slope - a tricky task as his design consists almost entirely of curves.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep8

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: Paddy Pimblett, Georgia, Li Jingliang, Petr Yan - An all-access look at the highly anticipated debut of British sensation Paddy The Baddy Pimblett. Bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Al Iaquinta join teammate Merab Dvalishvili on his homecoming tour of Georgia. Li Jingliang details his relationship with head coach and Chinese MMA pioneer Zhang Tiquan. And Petr 'No Mercy' Yan looks back at his memorableUFCdebut.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Debuts - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Wish You Were Here - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women
programme.desc: IBK Altos VS Pink Spiders - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Prelims - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event. A no contest in the pairs October bout left many unanswered questions and, this time, the Russian powerhouse and the dynamic Brazilian striker square off in a rematch, with both determined to dominate and make their case for a shot at the 205-pound title

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Main Event - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event. A no contest in the pairs October bout left many unanswered questions and, this time, the Russian powerhouse and the dynamic Brazilian striker square off in a rematch, with both determined to dominate and make their case for a shot at the 205-pound title

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: UFC 296: Edwards vs. Covington
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas this weekend with the final blockbuster of the year! UFC welterweight champion Leon Edwards steps into the Octagon with former interim titleholder and current No. 3 contender Colby Covington in the main event. UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja defends his title for the first time against No. 4 Brandon Royval in the co-main event.

programme.title: UFC 296: Edwards vs. Covington
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC returns to T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas this weekend with the final blockbuster of the year! UFC welterweight champion Leon Edwards steps into the Octagon with former interim titleholder and current No. 3 contender Colby Covington in the main event. UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja defends his title for the first time against No. 4 Brandon Royval in the co-main event.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.
